title: RMultiple Variables

metadata.description: Learn about RMultiple Variables with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Multiple Variables
R allows you to assign the same value to multiple variables in one line:
Example
# Assign the same value to multiple variables in one line
var1 <- var2 <- 
  var3 <- "Orange"
# Print variable values
var1
var2
var3

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
# Assign the same value to multiple variables in one line
var1 <- var2 <- 
  var3 <- "Orange"
# Print variable values
var1
var2
var3

summary: This tutorial covers RMultiple Variables concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use RMultiple Variables effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of RMultiple Variables and how to apply it in your projects.
